title: Mourning Figure
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. James H. Beal
provenance_text:
Benton Murdoch Spruance [1904-1967], Philadelphia, PA, until December 1959; Mr. [1898-1987] and Mrs. James H. Beal (born Rebecca Huebley Jones) [1898-1993], Pittsburgh, PA, December 1959 until March 15, 1960 [1]; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, March 1960 [2].

Notes:
[1]. Mrs. Beal purchased this lithograph from the artist for $60. The artist's invoice is dated December 5, 1959; payment (Mrs. Beal's check dated December 13, 1959) was acknowledged on December 15, 1959 (see curatorial file.)
[2]. The lithograph was sent to Carnegie Institute in February 1960 (acknowledged in a letter dated February 22, 1960) and was accessioned on March 15, 1960.
